docs.snippet: Twitter Inc, trying to boost its sagging advertising revenue, will allow brands to buy commercials on its video streams for Periscope, signaling a major push to make money off the live-streaming platform, the company announced on Tuesday morning....
docs.lead_paragraph: Twitter Inc, trying to boost its sagging advertising revenue, will allow brands to buy commercials on its video streams for Periscope, signaling a major push to make money off the live-streaming platform, the company announced on Tuesday morning.

headline.main: Twitter to Let Advertisers Buy Video Ads on Periscope
headline.print_headline: Twitter to Let Advertisers Buy Video Ads on Periscope

docs.snippet: U.S. pedestrian deaths rose sharply for the second year in a row in 2016, according to a study released on Thursday, a trend experts said mirrors increased driver cellphone use and distracted driving....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. pedestrian deaths rose sharply for the second year in a row in 2016, according to a study released on Thursday, a trend experts said mirrors increased driver cellphone use and distracted driving.

headline.main: U.S. Pedestrian Deaths Surge; Experts See Tie to Cellphones
headline.print_headline: U.S. Pedestrian Deaths Surge; Experts See Tie to Cellphones
